beer.name: Grimbergen Blonde
beer.description: Grimbergen is the brand name of a variety of Belgian abbey beers. Originally made by Norbertine monks in the Belgian town of Grimbergen, it is now brewed by two different breweries in Belgium and France.

comments.author: User 1
comments.content: I enjoyed this beer a lot!

comments.author: User 2
comments.content: Not really a newcomer to this style of beer, so I can definitely say this brew is very enjoyable!

comments.author: User 3
comments.content: A bit pricey eh, but you only life once, right?

beer.name: Guinness
beer.description: A dark Irish dry stout that originated in the brewery of Arthur Guinness at St. James's Gate, Dublin, Ireland, in 1759.

comments.author: User 4
comments.content: The Guinness we all know and love!

comments.author: User 5
comments.content: Never understood the love for dark beer. Definitely not for me.

comments.author: User 6
comments.content: You can tell a good beer with just one sip, but it is better to be sure!

beer.name: Matiné Session IPA
beer.description: This is a beer that has a massive hop punch but in a more sessionable package... meaning you can have more than one and still go about your business. The selection of hops deliver flavors of tangerine, passion fruit and peach in a drinkable package.

comments.author: User 7
comments.content: Esta cerveja é excelente! Deixa para trás um suave aroma a tangerina no paladar.

comments.author: User 8
comments.content: It is a portuguese india pale ale crafted with care and passion.
